entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
